mapper.select: SELECT a.terminal_network_id, a.up_value, a.down_value, a.upload_time, a.parent_id, a.data_type, a.terminal_ip FROM nmpl_terminal_data a, ( SELECT max(upload_time) AS q, terminal_network_id, data_type, parent_id FROM nmpl_terminal_data GROUP BY terminal_network_id, data_type, parent_id ) AS b WHERE a.terminal_network_id = b.terminal_network_id AND a.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.upload_time = b.q AND a.data_type = b.data_type AND b.data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=CHAR} order by a.upload_time desc
